trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when a <see cref="T:System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependency" /> class is used against a database table that is not enabled for change notifications.

The following code example attempts to create a <xref:System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependency> object and add an item to the <xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache> with a dependency on the <xref:System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependency> object.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo de código siguiente se intenta crear un <xref:System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependency> objeto y agregar un elemento a la <xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache> con una dependencia en el <xref:System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependency> objeto.

trans-unit.source: If the SQL Server database table is not enabled for dependency notifications, the <xref:System.Web.Caching.TableNotEnabledForNotificationException> is thrown and handled by calling the <xref:System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependencyAdmin.EnableTableForNotifications%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: Si la tabla de base de datos de SQL Server no está habilitada para las notificaciones de dependencia, el <xref:System.Web.Caching.TableNotEnabledForNotificationException> produce y se controla mediante una llamada a la <xref:System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependencyAdmin.EnableTableForNotifications%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> método.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Caching.TableNotEnabledForNotificationException" /> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Caching.TableNotEnabledForNotificationException" /> class.
The message that describes the error.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Caching.TableNotEnabledForNotificationException" /> class with the specified error message.
The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
The exception that is the cause of the current exception.
If the <c>innerException</c> is not <see langword="null" />, the current exception is raised in a <see langword="catch" /> block that handles the inner exception.

Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Caching.TableNotEnabledForNotificationException" /> class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
